title: Is it more beneficial for Meghan Markle to be an actress or a politician? - Quora

response.answer_text: it would be more beneficial if she just crawled in a pit and disappeared but we arent that lucky. shes never going to make it as a actress, if she was she would of already at least been better known before meeting harry instead of the rare person saying “she looks a bit like whatsherface from thingy” politics is another no go, she would have to give up even more than what shes already lost…no more duchess title, no more money from charles and we all know she wont turn down free money. not to sure if harry would have to give up anything or not with him being royalty, think theres a rule there or something bout royals and politics. with her fanbase and friend circle getting smaller and smaller the only real card shes got is having harrys baby. having archie and charles’ money is basically the only thing benefical for her, shes basically the prince wife version of a single mum getting child support payments

Meghan will be whatever is going to be most beneficial to her, whatever that may be. IMO she will not be an actress as she is getting too old to play any age appropriate part and she certainly doesn’t have the talent to be another Meryl Streep, Judi Dench etc. As for being a Politician, ummmm, she can certainly lie and twist the truth to suit her own narrative, but I don’t think she is able to handle confrontations, she runs in the opposite direction, sooo a politician, bit dicey. It is going to be interesting indeed to see what the future holds for Meghan !
